text.0: avaunt thou master of the mind depart and vanish far away.
text.1: look on destruction far from hence the live mans mind is manifold.
text.2: a happy boon do men elect a mighty blessing they obtain.
text.3: bliss with vaivasvata they see the live mans mind seeks many a place.
text.4: if by address by blame by imprecation we have committed sin awake or sleeping.
text.5: all hateful acts of ours all evil doings may agni bear away to distant places.
text.6: when indra brahmaṇaspati our deeds are wrongful and unjust.
text.7: may provident aṅgirasa prevent our foes from troubling us.
text.8: we have prevailed this day and won we are made free from sin and guilt.
text.9: ill thoughts that visit us awake or sleeping seize the man we hate yea seize the man who hateth us.
